references.reason: This paper details the architecture and capabilities of GPT-4, which is used in this paper to generate a synthetic dataset.

references.paper_title: On the dangers of stochastic parrots: Can language models be too big?
references.reason: This paper raises important ethical and safety concerns about large language models, which motivates the development of machine unlearning techniques.

references.paper_title: Towards making systems forget with machine unlearning
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of machine unlearning as a solution to remove the influence of unwanted data in machine learning models.
This paper introduces LLaVA, which is used in the study as the unlearned model to conduct experiments with machine unlearning methods.
This paper proposes an effective method to unlearn specific information from large language models, contributing to the mitigation of privacy risks.
